explains: n. 钱包；笔记本；经济来源；皮夹

sentences.en: The court has ruled that police don't violate the Fourth Amendment when they go through the wallet or pocketbook of an arrestee without a warrant.
sentences.cn: 法院裁定，警察在没有搜查令的情况下搜查被捕者的钱包或皮夹并不违反《第四修正案》。

sentences.en: He ate the roll and opened the pocketbook.
sentences.cn: 他吃了面包，把笔记本打开。

sentences.en: Someone grabbed her pocketbook off her shoulder, ripping her coat open.
sentences.cn: 有人从她肩上抢走了手提包，还把她的外套扯破。
